results.name: a(n) = C(3n,n)/(2n+1) mod 3.
comment: Conjecture: a(n) differs from 0 only when n=(3^j-1)/2,j=0,1,...
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..29524
formula: G.f.: A(x) satisfies A(x)=1+x*A(x^3). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Mar 24 2015
mathematica: Table[Mod[Binomial[3 n, n]/(2 n + 1), 3], {n, 0, 72}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 24 2015 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Oct 11 2005
